NL Question: Find all people who have FAMILY_REL relationships with other people, and for each person, return their name, surname, and the names and surnames of their family members.
Cypher: MATCH (p1:Person)-[r:FAMILY_REL]->(p2:Person) RETURN p1.name AS PersonName, p1.surname AS PersonSurname, collect({familyName: p2.name, familySurname: p2.surname}) AS FamilyMembers

❌ Value 'p2.surname' for property 'familySurname' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: Find persons who are family members of other persons and have email addresses, and also determine the number of crimes those family members are party to.
Cypher:
MATCH (p1:Person)-[:FAMILY_REL]->(p2:Person)
WHERE EXISTS { MATCH (p1)-[:HAS_EMAIL]->(:Email) }
MATCH (p2)-[:PARTY_TO]->(c:Crime)
RETURN p1.name, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS NumberOfCrimesFamilyMemberIsPartyTo

NL Question: Find all people who have the same current address as Jennifer Gray, and return their names and NHS numbers.
Cypher: MATCH (p1:Person {name: 'Jennifer', surname: 'Gray', nhs_no: '695-36-0203'})-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(l:Location)<-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(p2:Person) WHERE p1 <> p2 RETURN p2.name, p2.surname, p2.nhs_no

NL Question: Find all people who know other people who have an email address ending with '@networkadvertising.org'. Return the names of the people who know them.
Cypher: MATCH (p1:Person)-[:KNOWS]->(p2:Person)-[:HAS_EMAIL]->(e:Email) WHERE e.email_address = 'glane3c@networkadvertising.org' RETURN p1.name AS PersonName
